title: Shuumatsu no Izetta (Dub)
alternative_title: Izetta: The Last Witch, Izetta, Die Letzte Hexe, 終末のイゼッタ
description: If I am promised to the princess, then I will fight for her sake. In 1939 C.E., the imperialist nation of Germania invaded a neighboring country. All at once, that war spread throughout Europe, and the era was dragged into a spiral of a great war. Then, in 1940, Germania's attack turned towards the Principality of Elystadt, a small Alps country abundant with beautiful water and greenery.
